name: Withering Front
overview: Only one Primary Objective may be scored each round, and it shifts unpredictably, forcing constant repositioning and pressure.
primary_objectives: At the start of each round, randomly select 1 Primary Objective Marker to be the active objective. If a player controls the active Primary Objective at the end of the round, they score 3 Victory Points.
secondary_objectives: Each controlled Secondary Objective is worth 1 Victory Point at the end of the round.
special_rules: Inactive Primary Objectives may still be contested, but cannot be scored unless they are the active marker for that round.
